title: Stage S11
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The cat is on the chair.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: He is at home.
The cat is on the chair.
Water is in the bottle.
The book is under the table.
She is behind the tree.
The car is in front of the house.
We are at the bus stop.
The picture is on the wall.
My keys are in my bag.
The dog is next to the door.
He is at home.
The cat is on the chair.
Water is in the bottle.
The book is under the table.
She is behind the tree.
The car is in front of the house.
We are at the bus stop.
The picture is on the wall.
My keys are in my bag.
The dog is next to the door.
I met a girl who is a doctor.

sentences.kr: 이것이 어제 제가 산 책이에요. (사물 수식)
sentences.en: This is the book which I bought yesterday.

sentences.kr: 옆집에 사는 남자는 매우 친절해요. (사람 that)
sentences.en: The man that lives next door is very kind.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 파리에서 찍은 사진들을 보여줬어요. (사물 that)
sentences.en: She showed me the photos that she took in Paris.

sentences.kr: 저에게 영어를 가르쳐준 선생님은 매우 참을성이 있으셨어요.
sentences.en: The teacher who taught me English was very patient.
I love movies which have happy endings.
The restaurant that we went to was expensive.
The woman who called you is my sister.
This is the car which belongs to my father.
People who exercise regularly are usually healthy.
I met a girl who is a doctor.
